original_text: Many people did come. And they said things against Jesus that were not true. But still the Jewish leaders could not find a reason to kill Jesus.
korean_text: 거짓 증인이 많이 왔으나 얻지 못하더니 후에 두 사람이 와서

sentences.original_text: And they said things against Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 예수를 반대하는 말을 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: could not find a reason to kill Jesus.
